name: Job Interview with Cliff Rockslide (and Hot Doug)
name_original: Job Interview with Cliff Rockslide (and Hot Doug)
description:
Jump into your job interview to be the next cameraperson for Cliff Rockslide, Butterfly Valley's most popular streamer.

This is a minigame showing a teeny-tiny teaser on what the game is about! Local News with Cliff Rockslide is a first-person shooter, and your loyal weapon is your camera. Shoot the news as they are happening and help Cliff rise to the stardom he deserves.

Local News with Cliff Rockslide is coming out exclusively on Nintendo Switch on May 11th. Stay tuned!
